pages.text: $(li)The Soul Heart can be used to attract $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/spectre)Spectre$(/l) to you.$(br)$(li)It is a needed ingredient to brew a $(l:patchouli:potions/alexsmobs/soulsteal)Potion of Soulsteal$(/l) too.$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/soul_vulture)Soul Vultures$(/l) may drop this item upon death.
